allCharacters.description: The advanced scouts of the Kilimari roam the universe looking for planets to consume.

background.habits: The trilobot is a stealth robot that hides and only attacks when absolutely necessary.
background.traits: They are deceptive and cunning and relentless.

NarrativeScene.description: Title sequence with Sven bursting out of the jungle to the title sequence.
Sven reaches spaceship and climbs in.
Sven crashes into atmosphere and water
Sven swims to surface and walks into beach.
Sven retreats to the jungle and destroys the Trilobot using exploding fruit native to the planet.

allCharacters.description: The war machines of the Killmari. They crush planets and help the klllimari control vast swathes of the galaxy.

background.habits: The juggernauts exist to server their masters.
background.traits: These machines have one goal: destruction. They are slow and clumsy but once they train on their targets they are unstoppable

allCharacters.description: Sven is an unassuming Satellite repair man. He spends his time alone in his ship traveling to remote planets on the outskirt of the galaxy maintaining a network of exploration satellites. He is more of a lover than a fighter.

background.habits: Sven is a bit of a sloth, happy to be far from prying eyes as he does his work at his pace. He is also a bit of a coward and has avoided the space navy at all cost. He is kind and patient and caring for the people in his life like Kiera.
background.traits: Sven is a helpful unassuming character who likes to be alone. He connects with his handlers like Kiera but is happy to be engrossed in his work. He is generally scared of all things and not a hero.

NarrativeScene.description: Title sequence with Sven bursting out of the jungle to the title sequence.
Sven repairs satellite and is ambushed by Trilobot
Sven crashes into atmosphere and water
Sven reaches spaceship and climbs in.
Sven swims to surface and walks into beach.
Sven retreats to the jungle and destroys the Trilobot using exploding fruit native to the planet.

allCharacters.description: A heartless race of squid like creatures that live to take the natural resources from every planet in the galaxy.

background.habits: The killamari live to expand their empire.
background.traits: They are fearful of everything and surround themselves with armies of robots.

NarrativeWardrobe.name: Killamari exo-skeleton
NarrativeWardrobe.description: The life long container of the dreaded Killamari.

allCharacters.description: Kiera is the ever present voice in the sky overseeing Sven's operations from central command. We never see her on camera but she is Sven's secret love and they both dream of a day when they can be together.

background.habits: Kiera is a dreamer and loves to support the people she loves.
background.traits: Kiera is kind and thoughtful. She is curious and longs for adventure.

NarrativeScene.description: Sven repairs satellite and is ambushed by Trilobot
Sven swims to surface and walks into beach.
